call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - August 22nd 2024

decisions.decision: Move forward with beta version of auction house swag selling without Anne Unreal's help
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: Anne Unreal is busy with other projects
decisions.quote: And we are going to move forward kind of on a beta version of auction house swag selling. This is going to be without Anne Unreal's help.

decisions.decision: Mint NFTs one-to-one for swag and post them on auction house with shipping NFTs
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: Need to sell remaining swag from conference
decisions.quote: So for now, we're going to mint NFTs one-to-one for the swag. We're going to post them on auction house. We're also going to mint NFTs for general shipping to different countries.

commitments.commitment: Create a community poll for next spaces topic
commitments.quote: I forgot I was assigned to make a poll for the community.

commitments.commitment: Host Twitter spaces in two weeks
commitments.quote: So yeah, there will be space in two weeks.
But, yeah, it will be done in the coming days.

commitments.commitment: Dexy soft launch after deploying remaining contracts
commitments.quote: so yeah well soft launch will be yeah in weeks

commitments.commitment: Another round of ChainCash testing with more people
commitments.quote: So we are ready now for another round of testing. Now, well, we can include some more people there

commitments.commitment: Reach out to Ergo DAO for help with Keystone integration
commitments.quote: And yeah, we're probably going to reach out. For help from the Ergo DAO.

open_questions.question: What topic should be discussed in the next Twitter spaces
open_questions.context: Need community input for spaces content

open_questions.question: How to reshape the developer DAO structure
Need to formalize requirements for Oracle Pool software update
open_questions.context: People have asked for billing and other features

reversals_or_updates.previous: Plan to sell swag at conference
reversals_or_updates.update: Need to rethink strategy, might be more beneficial to give swag away
reversals_or_updates.reason: People were taking swag for free despite prices being displayed
reversals_or_updates.speaker: qx()

reversals_or_updates.update: Contracts and server have been updated and are ready for testing
reversals_or_updates.reason: Found issue preventing spending same notes twice for same public key
reversals_or_updates.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: About $4,000-$4,500 worth of swag remaining from conference
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Initial pull requests for Sigma 6.0 for testnet are now available
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Keystone integration will be much faster than Ledger integration
key_facts.speaker: mgPai

key_facts.fact: Cardano's Hydra demo ran Doom game at 32 transactions per second using three Hydra heads
key_facts.speaker: mgPai
